name: portfront
description: A portfolio detailing my experience as a web developer

scripts.createdir: mkdirp src/assets/bootstrap/ src/assets/font-awesome/ src/assets/css/ src/assets/images/ src/assets/js/
scripts.postinstall: npm run createdir && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist src/assets/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css src/assets/font-awesome/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts src/assets/font-awesome/ && cp -r assets/images/ src/assets/ && cp -r assets/js/ src/assets/ && npm run gulp sass && npm run gulp imageMin

author: Andre Noberto
